resources.string: You’re probably thinking, whose balls did I have to fondle to get my very own movie I can’t tell you his name, but it rhymes with Wolverine And let me tell you, he’s got a nice pair of smooth criminals down under Anyway, I’m here because I’ve got cancer in the lungs, prostate, brain, and every other organ there is But the real tragedy is that I’m living in my last days in a world where Hugh Jackman still exists
